price: (17) And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger [i.e., Moses],
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَجَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā qablahum qawma fir'ʿawna wajāahum rasūlun karīmun
